About Me

I'm Jean Penso, a computer scientist by day, ethical hacker by night. When I'm not coding or scripting, I'm diving into cloud computing or untangling the mysteries of pentesting. Currently, I'm learning assembly language, because who needs normal hobbies? In the world of tech and cybersecurity, I'm like a kid, always curious for learning something new.

If you are reading this... You're awesome!
